name: Creacards
description:
Creacards (Creatures + cards) is a card game where you play creatures in a battlefield. Sometimes, their power are not sufficient and you may combine them into a stronger one. You can also use the natures to reverse an apparently lost combat. For now, you can edit your deck and duel against a not so smart AI. More details are in the topics below.

If you like the idea of the game and want to contribute: make sure to donate.

Thanks for playing!
